name: nimtable
description: Nimtable is a minimal self-hosted spreadsheet app written in Nim. It provides a lightweight interface for editing and organizing simple tabular data in the browser.
features: Spreadsheet interface: Edit tabular data in a familiar grid layout with rows and columns.
Cell editing: Click to edit cells with support for text, numbers, and formulas.
Lightweight design: Minimal resource usage ideal for low-power servers or embedded systems.
Fast performance: Written in Nim for efficient execution and quick response times.
Data persistence: Save spreadsheets to disk with automatic or manual save options.
Import/export: Load and save data in CSV or other common spreadsheet formats.
Keyboard navigation: Move between cells and edit data using keyboard shortcuts.
Column operations: Add, remove, or resize columns to structure data effectively.
Row management: Insert, delete, or reorder rows for data organization.
Simple deployment: Easy setup with minimal dependencies for quick self-hosting.
Browser-based: Access spreadsheets from any device with a web browser.
Privacy-focused: All data stays on your server with no external dependencies or tracking.
